Elle soigne à hauteur de {[StatusEffects.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme par seconde pendant {[StatusEffects.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit.BaseDuration]}s ({[StatusEffects.Status_Passive_Lifestaff_Healing_AoeHealWhenHit_Timer.BaseDuration]}s de temps de recharge).

subjects.name: Orb of Protection
subjects.description: Shoot out a light projectile that grants {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]}% Fortify for {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]}s, heals an ally for 10% of weapon damage, and deals {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage when it hits an enemy. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.) \n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} Mana.
subjects.parsed_description:
Shoot out a light projectile that grants 10.0% Fortify for 20.0s, heals an ally for 10% of weapon damage, and deals 146.0% weapon damage when it hits an enemy. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)

Costs 16.0 Mana.
subjects.en_description: Shoot out a light projectile that grants {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]}% Fortify for {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]}s, heals an ally for 10% of weapon damage, and deals {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage when it hits an enemy. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.) \n\nCosts {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} Mana.
subjects.de_description: Verschießt ein Lichtgeschoss, das für {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]} Sek. {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]} % Verstärkung gewährt und Verbündete für 10 % des Waffenschadens heilt und {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]} % Waffenschaden verursacht, wenn es Gegner trifft. (Verstärkung verringert erlittenen Schaden.) \n\nKostet {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} Mana.
subjects.fr_description: Lance un projectile lumineux qui confère {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]} % de fortification pendant {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]}s, soigne un allié à hauteur de 10 % des dégâts de l'arme et inflige {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]} % des dégâts de l'arme lorsqu'il touche un ennemi (fortification réduit les dégâts subis). \n\nCoûte {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} points de mana.
subjects.es_description: Dispara un proyectil de luz que concede un {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]} % de Fortificación durante {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]} s, cura a un aliado un 10 % del daño de arma e inflige un {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]} % de daño de arma si impacta contra un enemigo (Fortificación reduce el daño recibido). \n\nCuesta {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} de maná.
subjects.it_description: Spara un proiettile di luce che fornisce un {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]}% di Fortificazione per {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]} secondi, guarisce un alleato del 10% dei danni da arma e infligge un {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}% dei danni da arma quando colpisce un nemico. (Fortificazione riduce i danni subiti). \n\nConsuma {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} punti mana.
subjects.pl_description: Wystrzel świetlisty pocisk, który zapewnia {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]}% do umocnienia na {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]} s, przywraca sojusznikowi zdrowie w wysokości 10% obrażeń od broni, a po trafieniu wroga zadaje mu {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}% obrażeń od broni. (umocnienie zmniejsza otrzymywane obrażenia). \n\nKoszt: {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} many.
subjects.pt_description: Dispara um projétil de luz que concede {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.ABSStandard * 100]}% de Reforço durante {[StatusEffects.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_OrbofProtection.BaseDuration]} s quando atinge um aliado, cura um aliado em 10% do dano de arma e causa {[DamageTable.LifeStaff_OrbofProtection.DmgCoef * 100]}% do dano de arma quando atinge um inimigo. (Reforço reduz o dano recebido.) \n\nCusta {[ManaCosts_Player.69.ManaCost]} de Mana.

subjects.name: Speed of Light
subjects.description: When Beacon heals a target it also applies {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% Haste for {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.BaseDuration]}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)

subjects.de_description: Wenn „Leuchtfeuer“ ein Ziel heilt, verleiht es auch {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]} % Eile, die {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.BaseDuration]} Sek. anhält. (Eile steigert das Bewegungstempo.)

subjects.pl_description: Gdy światło przewodnie leczy cel, zapewnia również {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% przyspieszenia na {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.BaseDuration]} s. (przyspieszenie zwiększa szybkość ruchu).
subjects.pt_description: Quando o Sinal Luminoso cura um alvo, ele também aplica {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% de Pressa por {[StatusEffects.Status_Upgrade_Lifestaff_Protection_AddHaste.BaseDuration]} s. (Pressa aumenta a velocidade de movimento.)
